definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: The change of organic acids in rice wine with the extension of fermentation time was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了江米酒中有機酸的成分及其隨發酵時間的變化。

sentences.english: We’re learning about the fermentation process.
sentences.chinese: 目前我們在學發酵過程。

sentences.english: As a result, the broth of Cordyceps militaris fermentation contained antimicrobial active substances.
sentences.chinese: 蛹蟲草發酵液中具有抗菌活性物質。

sentences.english: It had significant difference compared with the lactic acid bacteria fermented soybean milk.
sentences.chinese: 與乳酸菌發酵豆乳相比，口感有明顯的區別。

sentences.english: Changes in proteins of Semimembranosus and Biceps muscles mainly happened during curing and fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 股二頭肌的蛋白質降解主要是在醃製期和發酵中後期。

sentences.english: Don't put the fermentation container close to potting plants.
sentences.chinese: 發酵容器不能靠近盆栽植物放置。

sentences.english: Lactic acid production from sucrose and sugar cane bagasse by Rhizopus oryzae was studied.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究了米根黴利用蔗糖和蔗渣發酵生產乳酸。

sentences.english: Cover, and let rise until doubled in size, about 45 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 蓋上溼布進行基本發酵至麪糰兩倍大，大約45分鐘。

sentences.english: METHODS Bi-directional fermentation engineering was applied.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用雙向性發酵工程。

sentences.english: Produced nattokinase in liquid fermentation of Bacillus natto I.
sentences.chinese: 利用納豆菌I液體發酵生產納豆激酶。

sentences.english: Fermentation required only a day, and fractionation was not complicated.
sentences.chinese: 發酵只需要一天，分餾並不複雜。

sentences.english: In the popular and the young white wines, you can find the aroma of fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 在流行且淺齡的白葡萄酒裏，你可以找到發酵的香氣。

sentences.english: The desaponification and solid state fermentation on oil tea camellia defatted cake were carried out.
sentences.chinese: 對油茶枯餅的脫毒和發酵技術進行了研究。

sentences.english: Unfermented tea is called green tea and the leaves remain all of green.
sentences.chinese: 不經過發酵的，仍保持原色的是綠茶。

sentences.english: Make a paste from baking soda and water and apply directly to the mosquito bite.
sentences.chinese: 把發酵粉和水攪拌成糊狀，直接塗在蚊子叮咬處。

definition: to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
to lead to/to trigger/to initiate/to cause/to evoke (emotions)
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
to degenerate/to deteriorate/(of food) to go bad/to go off/(geology) metamorphism
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
